content: Pattakkaaran : Shubaholaabo…(pithaavinum puthranum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthi.)
Janam : Balaheenarum paapikallumaaya nyangallude mel / anugrahangallum karunayum / randu lokangallilum / ennumennekkum choriyappedumaaraakaname. / Aammeen.

Pattakkaaran : Daivamaaya kartthaave! Anashvaramaaya virunninum azhivillaattha manavaraykkum nyangalle yogyaraakkename. Aa virunnilekku kshanikkappettirikkunna athithhikallodukoode ninte nithyamaaya santoshangallilekku nyangalleyum kshanikkename. Avarude koottatthilum idayilum ninnukondu nyangall ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakaname. Hosho...

Aadimaneethijnyare vaazhtthiya Daivam than bahukrpayaal
/tee daasare vaazhttha - + tte devaa daya cheytheedaname
Havvaayodaadaa - mine vaazhtthiya Daivam than bahukrpayaal
/tee daasare vaazhttha - + tte devaa daya cheytheedaname
Saaraayodabaraamine vaazhtthiya Daivam than bahukrpayaal
/tee daasare vaazhttha - + tte devaa daya cheytheedaname
Raphkkayodisahaakkine vaazhtthiya Daivam than bahukrpayaal
/tee daasare vaazhttha - + tte devaa daya cheytheedaname
Raahelodu yaakko-bine vaazhtthiya Daivam than bahukrpayaal
/tee daasare vaazhttha - + tte devaa daya cheytheedaname

Mesrenil yause-ppine vaazhtthiya Daivam than bahukrpayaal
/tee daasare vaazhttha - + tte devaa daya cheytheedaname

Pattakkaaran : Kartthaave parasparam bandhitharaayirikkunna ee daasare ninte nalvarangallude aishvaryatthaal shreshdharaakkukayum ninte daanangallaal santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname. Ninte divyakalpanakallil ninnulllla aanandamkondu ivare niraykkename. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddha roohaayumaayullllove! Santoshollaasangallodukoode ivar ninakku sthuthi paadukayum thirusannidhiyil aahlaadikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Hosho...

Modikkatte param naathhaa!-haa-u-haa..
Nin shakthiyilum raksha-yilum nrpathi.
/tthannabhilaasham nee niravetti-haa.....
/tnijayaachana nirasi-chillethum.
Nalla varam nee mumperavaneki-haa....
Mahimaavin mudichoo-di thalayil
/tninnodu jeevan yaachichaan-haa.
/tdeerghaayussenne-kkum nalki.

Manavaraye mel svargatthil
Sabhaye nin kaantan sthhaapichaan
Vaagdattham pol, svargamevum
Shultthonanmaar haileyarkko...
Ssivarekkaall ninne melaakki.
Pattakkaaran : Naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu anugrahangallum karunayum yaachikkanam.
Janam : Anugrahikkunnavanaaya kartthaave / nyangallodkaruna cheythu / nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran : Sthuthiyum sthothravum prabhayum pukazhchayum idavidaathe karettuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.
Undaayirunnavanum ippozhullllavanum ennennekkum …avidutthe daasarude kireedangall aasheervadikkappedunna ee samayatthum... Bkoolhoon...
Ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum nyangall karettunnu. Hosho...

Sundarikallilathi sundari nee jaathikallil - soonu
Nrpathishalomon vimalasabhe - ninne laallippoo
/tninnadharangall madhuvarshikkunnu
/tvasanasugandham - neesaan kusumasamam
Sabhaye sakalavidham sumukhi - nee kara theendaattholl
Sleebaaye vandippathinaal raajaavaam mashihaa
Haalelooyyaa - kaakkunnu ninne.

Sabhayothunnenne moonnu - kottakall chuttunnu
Vanchakanaam dushdaathmaavi - ngullllil pookidaa
/tbandhichavayaa - nanyonyam moonnum
/tkottakallidayil - sthhalamilliva paartthaal
Thaatha suthaamala roohaayaam - ekathvam thrithvam
Mahimayezhum manavaatti samam maddhye mevunnen
Haalelooyyaa - u - haalelooyyaa.
Nyangallum ivarum ninte valathubhaagatthu ninnukondu ninte karunaye darshikkukayum ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Hosho...

Paulosu shleehaa
Dhanyan chol ketten - ithe - vam
Ningalle nyangall ariyichathinethiraay
Veroruvan vannariyichaal
Vaanavanengkilumaadoothan
Thaanelkkum sabhayin shaapam
Palatharamupadeshangallaho
Paaril mullachuparakkunnu
Daivatthinnupadesham tho-
Ttavasaanippippon dhanyan
Shushrooshakkaaran : Parishuddhanaaya paulosu shleehaa ephesosukaarkku ezhuthiya lekhanatthil ninnum. Aahaayu baarekmor.
Janam : Shleehaayude udayavanu sthuthiyum / nammudemel thante anugrahangallum / ennekkum / undaayirikkatte.

Nammude kartthaavaaya yeshumashihaayude naamatthil sarvvadaa sarvrtthinum vendi pithaavaaya daivatthe sthuthikkuvin. Mashihaayilulllla snehatthaal paraspparam keezhppedukayum cheyvin. Sthreekalle nammude kartthaavine ennaprakaaram ningall ningallude bhartthaakkanmaare anusarippeen. Entennaal mashihaa sabhayude thalayum shareeratthinte rakshithaavum aakunna prakaaram bhartthaavu bhaaryayude thalayaakunnu. Sabha mashihaaykku keezhppedunna prakaaram thanne bhaaryamaarum avaravarude bhartthaakkanmaarkku sakalatthilum keezhppedanam. Purushanmaare, mashihaa thante sabhaye snehichathupole ningallum ningallude bhaaryamaare snehippeen. Sabhaye jalatthilulllla snaanam kondum vachanam kondum vendumvannam shuddheekarikkuvaanum kuttamo kuravo thatthulyangallaaya mattu vallathumo koodaathe nirmmalayum vishuddhayumaaya thejasviniyaayi svakeeyayaakkuvaanumaayittu sabhaykkaayi mashihaa svapraanane samarppichuvallo. Angane thanne purushanmaar svanta shareerangalle ennapole bhaaryamaare snehikkendathaakunnu. Entennaal thante bhaaryaye snehikkunnavan thannetthanneyaakunnu snehikkunnath. Aarum orikkalum svantam shareeratthe dveshikkunnillallo. Pinneyo mashihaa sabhaykkuvendi ennathu pole athine poshippikkukayum athinuvendi shramikkukayum cheyyunnu. Naam avidutthe shareeratthinte avayavangallum maamsabandhikallum asthhisambandhikallumaakunnu. Aayathukondu purushan thante pithaavineyum maathaavineyum vittupirinyu thante bhaaryayodu chernnirikkum. Avariruvarum ekashareeramaayittheerukayum cheyyum. Ithu oru valiya rahasyamaan. Nyaan mashihaayekkurichum avidutthe sabhayekkurichumaakunnu parayunnath. Aprakaaram thanne ningall ororuttharum, thanne ennapole thante bhaaryaye snehikkanam. Bhaaryayaakatte svabhartthaavine aadarikkukayum venam. Makkalle ningall kartthaavine ortthu maathaapithaakkanmaare anusarippeen. Entennaal athu neethiyaakunnu. Ninakku nanma varuvaanum nee bhoomiyil deerghaayussaayirippaanumaayittu ninte pithaavineyum maathaavineyum bahumaanikkukaennullllathu prathijnya cheyyappetta prathhama kalpanayaakunnu. Aahaay...Baarekmor.

Haalelooyyaa - u - haalelooyyaa modikkatte param naathhaa
Nin shakthiyilum - rakshayilum nrpathi - haalelooyyaa

Shushrooshakkaaran : Naam adakkatthodum bhayatthodum vanakkatthodum chevikodutthu nammude mumpaake vaayikkappedunna nammude kartthaaveshumashihaayude vishuddha evangeliyonile daivatthinte jeevanulllla vachanangallude ariyippine kellkkanam.
Janam : Avidutthe aathmaavinodu koode / daivamaaya kartthaavu / nyangalleyum / yogyaraakki theerkkumaaraakatte.

Janam : Vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanum vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. / Nammude rakshaykkaayi thanne ayachavanu sthuthikallum / naam ellaavarudeyummel thante anugrahangallum / ennekkum undaayirikkatte.

Pattakkaaran : Ee vachanangall samsaarichukazhinyashesham Yeshu galeelaayil ninnu yaathra purappettu yorddaante marukarayil yeehoodinte athirtthiyil etthi. Janasamoohangall addehatthe anugamikkukayum avidevachu avare sukhappedutthukayum cheythu. Anantaram pareekshaarththham preeshanmaar adutthuchennu ethoru kaaranatthaalengkilum orutthanu thante bhaaryaye pirichuviduvaan nyaayamundo ennu chodichu. Addeham avaroduttharam paranyu. Aadiyil srshdikartthaavu aanum pennumaayi avare srshdichu ennum aayathukondu purushan thante pithaavineyum maathaavineyum vittu bhaaryayodu chernnirikkukayum avariruvarum oru shareeramaayittheerukayum cheyyumennu ningall vaayichittillayo. Aakayaal avar randalla, oru shareeramaakunnu. Athukondu Daivam samyojippichathine manushyan verpirikkaruth. Avar addehatthodu anganeyengkil mochanapathram kodutthu avalle pirichuviduvaan mosha kalpichirikkunnathu entukondaanu ennu chodichu. Addeham avarodu paranyu. Mosha ningallude hrdayakaadhinyam nimittham bhaaryamaare pirichuviduvaan ningalle anuvadichu. Ennaal aadiyil anganeyaayirunnilla. Nyaan ningallodu parayunnu. Vyabhichaara kuttam kondallaathe svabhaaryaye upekshichu mattorutthiye parigrahikkunnavan cheyyunnathu vyabhichaaramaan. Upekshikkappettavalle parigrahikkunnavan cheyyunnathum vyabhichaaram thanne. Shishyanmaar addehatthodu bhaaryaabhartthaakkanmaarude parasparasthhithi ee vidham kuttakaramengkil vivaaham cheyyunnathu nallathallallo ennu paranyu. Addeham paranyu, varam labhichavanallaathe ellaavarum ee vachanatthinu shaktharalla. Entukondennaal thangallude maathaavinte udaratthil ninnuthanne shandanmaaraayi janichittulllla shandanmaarund. Manushyaraal shandanmaaraakkappettittulllla shandanmaarumund. Svargaraajyam nimittham thangalle thanne shandanmaaraakkittheertthittulllla shandanmaarumund. Shakthanaakuvaan kazhiyunnavan shakthanaakatte ennu thaan kalpicharulli cheythu.

Vandya sleebaattharuvinmel
Neethimahaaraviyaam ninne
Nirmmalayaam sabha kandappoll
Ampilli thulyam kramamaayu ninni
Ttakhilaadhipanaam nin praagathbhyatthe
Vidhipol bhamgyaa ghoshichu
/Tpithaavinteyum puthranteyum parishuddha roohaayudeyum naamatthil ee kireedangallum iva vaykkappedunna shirassukallum ennenneykkum aasheervadikkappettu poornnamaakkappettirikkunnu.

Vaaneennudayon kayyaal
Makudam ghoshamira - ngunnu
Manavaallane aachaaryan
Aniyikkum makudam ramyam

Vaidikashemmaashanmaarkkanmpaalimpam-nalka
Mudiyaal manavaallannum manavarayaal manavaattikkum
Pattakkaaran : Vaaneennudayon…

Mahithaachaarya nmaaraal dampathikallkkekeeduvaan
Mashihaa nrpanaal rachitham makudam paaram ruchiram
Pattakkaaran : Vaaneennudayon...

Pattakkaaran : Kartthaavu ninne neethiyinkireedam dharippikkukayum akshayamaaya alangkaarangallaal alangkarikkukayum shathruvinte sakala shakthikkum ethiraayi ajayyamaaya aayudham dharippikkukayum cheyyatte.

Vaaneennudayon kayyaal
Makudam ghoshamira - ngunnu
Manavaattiye aa - chaaryan
Aniyikkum makudam ramyam

Vaidikashemmaashanmaarkkanmpaalimpam nalka
Mudiyaal manavaallannum manavarayaal manavaattikkum
Pattakkaaran : Vaaninnudayon...

Mahithaachaaryanmaaraal dampathikallkkekiduvaan
Mashihaa nrpanaal rachitham makudam paaram ruchiram
Pattakkaaran : Vaaninnudayon...

Manavaallanthan - makudam thirumullmudiyodu sadrshyam,
Manavaattiyude makudam sathimaar mudiyodu sadrshyam.
Pattakkaaran : (manavaattiyude shirassil kireedam dharippichukond)
Neethiyin kireedavum akshayabhamgiyulllla alangkaarangallum kartthaavu ninne dharippikkatte. Pithaavinum puthranum parishuddhaathmaavinum sthuthi karettikkondu aayushkkaalam muzhuvanum santoshikkuvaan ninakkidayaavukayum cheyyatte. Hosho...
Janam : Aammeen
(intyayile puraathanamaaya aachaaramanusarichu manavaattiyude kazhutthil kurishu kettikkunnu.)

Sleebo oso dshano
Sleebo neeshodsokkooso
Sleebo dbeupheekkinaan
Bekkoolaan meshthabhareenaan

Shubhachihnam thaan sleebaa
Vijayakkodi thaan sleebaa
Namme rakshicheedum
Sleebaayil pukazhunnu naam

Vinayam maanam pathibhakthi en priya thannude moodupadam
Raphkkaayathinaalaavrthayaayu - moodanamathupol manavaatti

Pattakkaaran : Manushyajeevithatthil santoshikkunnavanaaya kartthaavu ningallude jeevithatthil preethippettu ningallude bandhatthe anugrahikkumaaraakatte. Svargeeya manavaallanaaya mashihaa yathhaarththhamaaya thante manavaallathvatthaal ningallude manavaallathvatthinu mudrayidatte. Mashihaa thante sabhayil ennapole ningall anyonyam santoshikkumaaraakatte. Karunayulllla valatthukai vannu ningallil aavasichu ellaa upadravangallil ninnum ningalle kaatthukollllatte. Samaadhaana doothan ningallodukoodi irunnu aakalkkarusaayude vanchanayil ninnu ningalle samrakshikkumaaraakatte. Maranakaramaaya asooyayil ninnu Daivam ningalle kaatthukollllukayum, ningalle parasparam santoshippikkukayum, ningallil ninnu duഃkhangalle neekkikkallayukayum cheyyatte. Abrahaam isahaakkilum, isahaakku yaakkobilum yaakkobu yauseppilum santoshichaprakaaram ningallkkum santoshikkendathinu utthama santaanangalle kartthaavu ningallkku nalkumaaraakatte. Ningall varddhichu peruki bhoomiyil nirayuvin ennu paranyukondu Daivam nohinum makkallkkumaayi nalkiya anugrahavum ningallil vasikkatte. Aakaashatthu ninnu panimanyum bhoomi ulpaadippikkunna sarvva salphalangallum Daivam ningallkku nalkatte. Ninte pithaavinte Daivam ninne sahaayikkum ennu paranyukondu yaakkobu thante puthranaaya yauseppinu nalkiyathaaya anugraham ningallil vasikkatte. Daivatthe snehikkukayum avidutthe ishdam aacharikkukayum cheythittullllavarude anugraham ningallilum pattakkaarude kaikallaal ningallude thalayil innu vaykkappettathaaya kireedangallilum vasikkumaaraakatte. Kartthaavinte naamam ningalludemel villikkappettirikkunnathinaal ellaa jaathikallum santoshichu mahathvam paadumaaraakatte. Aishvaryangall kondum sampaadyangall kondum sarvavidha saubhaagyangall kondum Daivam ningalle sampannaraakkukayum aa paapiniyodennapole ningallude kadangallum paapangallum kshamikkukayum cheyyatte. Valatthubhaagatthe kallllaneppole ningallum svargaraajyatthinu avakaashikallaayi bhavikkatte. Naamellaavarudeyum marichupoyavar paapaparihaaram praapikkukayum cheyyatte. Mesanilninnu koottikkonduponna manavaattiyodu udampadi cheyyuvaanaayi seenaayi malayil irangivanna aa mahonnathan ningalleyum nammude ee samgham muzhuvaneyum anugrahikkumaaraakatte. Namukku pithaavinum puthranum parishuddha roohaaykkum sthuthi karettaam. Hosho...

Edanthottam nattone
Neeyaanen yuvamanavaallan
Nin thottattheennenperkkaay
Veeshicheeduka kullirthennal

Sathyamanaallaa neethijnyaa
Naathhaa! Nyaan nin manavaatti
Neeyaanen thanalum thaangum
Cheyyanamennodu kaarunyam

Sleebaayaalavakaashadhanam
Mudrithamaakki peedakallaal
Adima vidartthi svargatthil
Pantiyilenne neeyetti

Naallum maasavum aandum nyaan
Paapappaazhirullil pokki
Nin jeevadhvani kettappoll
Kannu thellinyaanandichen

Kartthaave ninnaardratha nirayum vaathil thurannee
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallilanpundaakenam

Daivaathmajane dampathikalleyum thalayil choodum
Makudangalleyum valathukaratthaal vaazhttheedenam +

Naamam chonnee dampathikallkkaayu varamekenam +
Thejolokatthivarude kaalam shubhamaakenam

Dhanyathayaarnnoll parishuddhanmaar thal praarththhanayaal
Vaazhtthaname + ee jananivahattheyennenneykkum

Nin sthuthi paadaan kinnaramenti sthothram cheyvaan
En kartthaave ivarude vaaykkalle vaazhttheedenam +

Sarvvam kettittabhyarththhanaye kaikkollvone
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpa cheyyenam

Pattakkaaran : Vaathsalya sahodarangalle, naamellaavarum daivabhavanatthil sannihitharaayirikkunna ee sandarbhatthil, vishvaasikalle prabodhippikkukayum, nammude mumpil nilkkunna ivar sathyatthilum neethiyilum salpravrtthikallilum thalpararum nalla kaaryangallil uthsaahikallum aayirikkanamennu urappaayi kalppikkukayum cheyyuka enna paaramparyam namukkund. Ithu vishuddha pithaakkanmaaril ninnu naam praapichittullllathum bahumaanyaraaya poorvvikanmaar namme bharamelpichittullllathumaan. Makkalle, ippoll ningall daivasannidhiyilum, nammude kartthaaveshumashihaayude simhaasanamaaya jeevameshayudeyum, sleebaayudeyum vedippulllla evangeliyonteyum, ee janakkoottatthinteyum mumpaakeyaanu nilkkunnathennu prathyekam shraddhippeen. Hrdayavichaarangall ariyunnavante sannidhiyilaakunnu, ariyaatthavante mumpaakeyalla ningall nilkkunnath. Ithaa ee samayam nyaan ningalle parasparam bharamelppikkunnu.

Enikkum ningallkkumidayil Daivam maddhyasthhanaayirikkatte. Niyama viruddhamaayi ningall cheyyunna sakalatthilum nyaan niraparaadhiyaayirikkum. Pattakkaarilum shemmaashshanmaarilum, vishvaasikallaaya janatthilum manavaallanilum manavaattiyilum, kshanikkappettavarilum kshanichavarilum daivatthinte anugrahangallum karunayum vannu samrddhiyaayi aavasikkatte. Anugrheethayaaya maathaavum daivajananiyumaaya vishuddha kanyakamariyaaminteyum, nammude kartthaavine snehikkukayum avidutthe kalpanakall aacharikkukayum cheythittullllavaraaya sarvva vishuddhanmaarudeyum praarththhanakallaal kartthaaveshumashihaayude valathukai ennennekkum ningallil aavasikkumaaraakatte.

/tveendum vishvaasikalle, ee kalpanakall ningallkkellaavarkkumaayittaakunnu ennu arinyukollveen. Ningallil ororutthanum avanavante bhaaryayodulllla bandham enganeyaayirikkanamennu nallavannam shraddhippeen. Ivall svantamaallukalle vedinyu ivallude bhartthaavinodu samyojippikkappettirikkunnu. Aakayaal avan avalle preethippedutthukayum avallodu dayavullllavanaayirikkukayum venam. Avan nagnanaayirunnaalum avallkku dharippaan nalkanam. Thante praananeppole avall avanodu vartthikkanam. Avan vishannirunnaalum avallkku bhakshanam nalkanam. Avan daahichirunnaalum avallkku kudippaan nalkanam. Avallum nyaayamaayaprakaaram avante paricharanam nirvvahikkuvaan kadappettavallaakunnu. Ellaa kaaryangallilum snehatthodum prematthodum koodi avall avante adukkal vartthikkanam. Nammude kartthaaveshumashihaayude krpa nyangallilum ningallilum ennekkum undaayirikkatte.

Janam : Ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappedename. / Ninte raajyam varename. / Ninte thiruvishdam svargatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakename. / Nyangallkkaavashyamulllla appam innum nyangallkku tharaname. / Nyangallude kadakkaarodu nyangall kshamichathupole / nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum nyangallodu kshamikkename. Pareekshayilekku nyangalle praveshippikkaruthe. / Pinneyo dushdanil ninnum nyangalle rakshichukollllaname. / Entukondennaal raajyavum shakthiyum mahathvavum / ennekkum ninakkullllathaakunnu. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran : Krpa niranya mariyame ninakku samaadhaanam.

Janam : Nammude kartthaavu ninnodu koode. / Sthreekallil nee vaazhttha ppettavallaakunnu. / Ninte udaraphalamaaya / nammude kartthaaveshumashihaa vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. Shuddhamulllla kanyaka marttha - mariyame / thampuraante amme / paapikallaaya nyangallkkuvendi / ippozhum eppozhum / nyangallude maranasamayatthum / daivamthampuraanodu apekshichukollllaname. Aammeen.
Shushrooshakkaaran : Vandya pithaavinte praarththhana naam ettuchollanam.

Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall haa-haa
Nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum
Ninnazhakarachan mohippaan haa - haa
Nin janamorkkaayka pithrgrhavum

Bhaktharpukazhchaa bhaajaname!
Ninniludichoreka suthan
Thrkkarall nyangallilalivaan than
Pakkalapekshayanaykkenam

Moraaneesho kurishum nin
Maathrjanatthin praarththhanayum
Adikalleyum nin kopatthin
Vadikalleyum maaycheedenam.

Nayavaan pana pole thallirtthidume - haa…
Vallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol
Vrddhathayilumavar thallirittu thazhachidume haa...
Varddhikkumavarkku thushdi pushadikallum.

Orupolingum (maartthommaa)
Unde melum ninnormma
Uthakaname nin praarththhana nin
Ormmaye bahumaanichorkkaay.

Bhaagyam nibiyarkkum - bhaagyam shleeharkkum
Bhaagyam sahaderkkum - punaruththhaana dine

Mashihaaye kaanmaan kaamkshichoru sahader
Vaallaal chirakukall poo-ndunnathapadameri

Parishuddhanmaare! Ningall
Praarththhippeen kartthaavodaay
Adikalleyum thankopatthin
Vadikalleyum maayicheedaan
